column2: "Po ho sar do atsɛmbusɛm. Dɛ ekyinehyia mframa a ofi Negeb robɔ ba no
column4: ofi asaase a ɔyɛ hu do."

column2: "Enyido adzehu a ɔyɛ awerɛhow na woeyi akyerɛ me; ɔfomfafo rofom fa
column3: na ɔsɛɛfo no resɛɛ. Elam ee
column5: kɔ no ntuae; apensi a ɔdze abɔbɔ dze nyina mama aba ewiei."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na m'asen mu guan me yerɛyerɛw; ɔkyem aka me
column3: dɛ ɔbaa awokofo kyem; ɔyɛ me yaw ma menntse asɛm; mabɔ hu ara ma munnhu adze."
suro eyi mo hu: ewimbir kan a mo kɔn dɔe no adan ahopopo ama me."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE aka akyerɛ me nye yi
column4: fa ɔweɔmfo kegyina hɔ; ma ɔnka dza ohu nkyerɛ:"
nsoasopɔnkɔ dɔm na efumpɔnkɔ dɔm a

column2: "Na ɔweɔmfo no bɔɔ mu dɛ ogyata dɛ; Ao
column4: migyina aweɔnee aban do daa adzekyee
mpɔnkɔdofo beenu beenu. Na obuae see dɛ
column6: ɔahwe ase; na n'abosom ehonyi a woegu nyina ebubu egu famu."

column3: na m'aporoweebea do eburow: dza matse wɔ dɔm EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn no anomu no na maka makyerɛ hom yi."

column2: "Duma ho atsɛmbusɛm. Obi fi Seir refrɛ se me dɛ
column4: anadwe ber bɛn nye yi? Ɔweɔmfo
na adzesaa so reba; sɛ hom bebisa a

column2: "Arabia ho atsɛmbusɛm. Kwaa a ɔwɔ Arabia no mu na hom bɔsoɛ

column3: brɛ no nsu; Tema asaase do atsefo ee
column4: hom mfa edziban mbehyia eguamfo no."

column2: "Na dza EWURADZE aka akyerɛ me nye yi
column6: "#21.16 ƆPAANYI MFE: Iyi hyɛ ase fitsi ber a wɔfaa no no
column7: dze kesi ber a ɔdze wiee n'apaadzi no."
